rows.Description:
This method is used to get address of the server based on host or ip. It accepts the following parameters:

  • transport (Object) : https or http

This method returns tenent domain name based on tenentID, username or url. It accepts the following parameters:

  • options (Object) : object with information such as tenentId, username and/or url.

This method returns tenent Id based on tenentID, username or url. It accepts the following parameters:

  • options (Object) : object with information such as tenentId, username and/or url.

This method returns tenent user object when user name is given. It accepts the following parameters:

  • username (String) :
This returns an object with tenant user information. 
{'domain' : 'carbon.super', 'username' : 'admin', 'tenantId' : -1234}
This method is used to run a function using a different tenant.
